jobDescription: This role requires knowledge and experience in creating models in MATLAB/Simulink- not using MATLAB/Simulink but creating the models to be used.The ideal candidate will have experience inModel Based Engineering in Matlab /Simulink.This is not embedded software engineering- but Model Based Engineering demonstrated experience is needed, ideally in high voltage automotive systems.Work within a team of Powertrain controls, calibrations and integration engineers to develop electrified powertrain charging systems for current and next-generation electrified powertrainsSupport High to DC charging Develop the algorithms and controls in Simulink.Required Engineering Experience & Skills5+ years of experience in controls, calibration, validation Powertrain and/or ePT engineering2+ problem solving and communication skillsMust be strong team player willing to work in fast –paced environment actively supporting multiple projectsEngineering Education RequiredBachelors of Science in
